alert.note: Alert for Chester; Hardeman; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 6:40AM CST until January 03 at 7:30AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Hardeman County in west Tennessee... Southern Madison County in west Tennessee... Southwestern Chester County in west Tennessee... * Until 730 AM CST. * At 640 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cloverport, or 8 miles northwest of Bolivar, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Henderson, Bolivar, Chickasaw State Forest, Chickasaw State Park, Whiteville, Silerton, Masseyville, Cloverport, Toone, Medon, Pinson, Pine Top, Parkburg, Vildo, Hatchie, Uptonville, Hickory Corners, Deanburg, Teague and Montezuma. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for west Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for west Tennessee.
